This class illustrates how you can create a Java-bean like component in JavaScript

Public Methods

roast CoffeeBean.js:23 
roast() → {}

Roast this coffee bean.

NOTE: You cannot re-roast coffee beans and an error will be thrown if you try to roast a roasted coffee bean.
